sentences.en: Street-fighting in Osh, the largest city in southern Kyrgyzstan, between ethnic Kyrgyz and minority Uzbeks escalated rapidly into a pogrom.
sentences.cn: 在吉尔吉斯斯坦南部第一大城市奥什市，吉尔吉斯族和乌兹别克族的街头冲突迅速升级成为一场大屠杀。

trans.tran_en: a planned killing of large numbers of people, usually done for reasons of race or religion
